content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The rental price I have in mind is €1,500 per month. Remember, I'm not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I'll try everything in my power to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the discussion, but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
